Key Match Events: Shaedon Sharpe scored a career-high 33 points for Portland
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Edwards said the team needs to'mature' after the loss
Rudy Gobert stated that he needs to set the tone for the team defensively
Julius Randle placed blame on the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Timberwolves have slipped from first to ninth in defensive rating
The team is 25th in rebounding average
Donte DiVincenzo is shooting just 30.6 percent from deep
Others: The Timberwolves lost to the Portland Trail Blazers 106-98
The loss was the Wolves' third straight defeat
The team will face the Orlando Magic tomorrow at 12:00 am
